Value.label: Siren Strobe Mode
Value.Help: Defines the reaction of the siren: [0] Strobe and Siren, [1] Siren, [2] Strobe (Default setting: 0)

Value.label: Alarm auto stop
Value.Help: Defines the auto time out of the alarm indication: [0] 30 seconds, [1] 60 seconds, [2] 120 seconds, [3] Continuous (Default setting: 0)
